Hmm. Exakt hur patchar jag CD3?

Skriv dig fram till ...../cd3

Skriv :applyppf flt-rok3.bin flt-rfix.ppf

tryck enter. 

patchen läggs till.

skriv exit för att avsluta kommandotolken.

Installera spelet, cd3 är game cd. på den skivan finns även cracket.

To anyone wondering what the hell to do with all those files and unable to translate to English:

1. Open command-line window (aka DOS window) by going Start -> Run... -> cmd -> ENTER
2. Navigate to CD3 directory (use cd command; CD - Change Directory). Figure out yourself how to do it.
3 Apply the patch to the CD image by typing
applyppf flt-rok3.bin flt-rfix.ppf
ENTER
4. You'll a have a fixed image. The game won't crash after level one after that.
